review_5: This game is solid fun and makes you feel like a ninja. Blocking swords and projectiles, timing your hits, general ninjaness. The only reason I don't play it more is it does not reward good form. It does not care if the blade edge is aligned or you take a big swing. The blades have minimal inertia, so the most effective way to dispatch enemies is to do "wiggle-sword" in their bellies. That being said, if you just want to be a ninja, it is super awesome if you just lean into the role-playing, take big swings and try to slice people in half. Fruit Ninja with ninjas. Ninja Ninja. Also, they come to you, so no motion sickness. Kinda un-ninja like to be honest. I should be running and hiding and putting fake heads on my shoulders and throwing poison darts. But we're not going for historical accuracy here, we're going for the history written by ninjas after ninjas take over.
